name: Mutilate-a-Doll 2013
description:
To celebrate Mutilate-a-Doll 2's sixth birthday, I'm releasing the version of the game as it was a day before release in 2013.

This is Mutilate-a-Doll 2013.

Included are:

- A ragdoll!

- Several items!

- At least 2013 bugs!

- Very wonky controls!

- Nostalgia?

If you find a bug you can submit it in the nearest time machine.
